Class Parser

  • java.lang.Object
    • Parser

  • public class Parser
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Adrian Reads the input file checks correctness and returns the generation zero to start the game.

      • readCellsFromFile

        private Cell[][] readCellsFromFile()
                            throws IncorrectCharException,
                                   java.io.IOException
        Reads source file and sets dead cell for '.' and living cell for '*'. Exception is thrown on other characters
        Returns:
        The an Array with living and dead cells, as described in the source file
